name: Google+ Theme : Khaotic Blue.
description:
A Simple Black With Blue Google+ Theme.
I'll be updating as much as I can for a truly black feel.
If you have any comments or concerns please contact me.


Donation is available; I work hard to make these themes.

Thank you. 

*REQUEST YOUR COLOR!*
additional_info:
VERSION : Khaotic.0.0.1
CHANGE LOG :
CREDITS: KhaoticFate


First Time Installing Instructions :

1. Install Stylish (Firefox or Chrome)
2. Click Install With Stylish
3. Refresh Or Open A New Window And Go To Google+


Notes : 

If You Come Across A Problem Please E-Mail Me Directly
